info.instr: Starting on ground floor of Coffman, turn right once you reached the end of the elevator.
Walk past the TCF office and follow the hallway until you reached a doorway on the right.
You have entered the gopher tunnel, and turn left and follow the Boynton Health sign.
You use your U of M card to enter the dooeway and continue to walk straight.
On your right, you will see a doorway leads to Nils Hasselmo Hall.
You are now on the basement level of Nils Hasselmo Building!
